Package com.github.fge.largetext.sequence Description

Subsequences of a LargeText

This package deals with calls to LargeText.charAt(int) and LargeText.subSequence(int, int). The goal is to create a sequence with the minimal set of TextRanges enclosing the required index or indices.

The CharSequenceFactory class is in charge of generating such sequences; in turn, it is used by MultiRangeCharSequence to obtain subsequences of itself. If the requested index range fits a single text range, a CharBuffer is returned directly, or a subsequence of it.
